plugin.name: InfernoMOO
plugin.author: InfernoMOO BOTA Corporation
plugin.purpose: Functions for the InfernoMOO MUSHclient soundpack
plugin.description:
This plugin contains triggers and aliases for the InfernoMOO MUSHclient soundpack. Do not import this into other muds; you will receive errors.
This plugin was initially developed by Chariot on InfernoMOO, and is now being maintained by Dgleks, Beniscen, and various other members of the InfernoMOO BOTA corporation.

trigger.send: if area~=39 then area=39 ppi.stop(0) music_id = ppi.play(path.."music/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Mv) amb_id = ppi.play(path.."music/am/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Av) end

trigger.match: You trudge through the crumbling terrain towards *
You suck in a glorious lungful of air as your head breaks the water's surface*

trigger.send: if area~=37 then area=37 ppi.stop(0) music_id = ppi.play(path.."music/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Mv) amb_id = ppi.play(path.."music/am/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Av) end

trigger.match: [ You caught a new kind of fish! ]
Your credit implant beeps for a deposit of *
You struggle through the water, unsure of your swimming skills.
You smash * against the ground, cracking it open.

trigger.send: if area~=3 then area=3 ppi.stop(0) music_id = ppi.play(path.."music/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Mv) amb_id = ppi.play(path.."music/am/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Av) end

trigger.match: * jabs * * leaving a small red dot.
* nearly falls over in a wild *
* is caught in a spray of * puke from *
* impacts *, but does not appear to cause any damage.
* hits the ground with a wet thud.
* has been deducted from your credit chip.
* lunges hard at * extended. In a flash, * is poking from * of *, * * forced through *
* hooks * into * and slides it down *
* lashes out with * *, snapping * around * and pulling * tight, jerking * toward * and landing a rough kick to * *. * gurgles and chokes as * snaps, then crumples to the ground, twitching.

trigger.send: ppi.play(path.."combat/gun/emp miss.ogg",0,0,Gv) if cspam=="on" then print("%0") end

trigger.match: * lunges forward in a desperate last-ditch attack, but * sidesteps, sending * sprawling*
* jams * deep into * with a mad shriek.
* is caught in a spray of toxic puke from *
* hooks * * under * and yanks back hard, whipping * cleanly through *
Ugh, you're getting covered in disgusting slop.
In an instant, * flashes clean through *
From *, you hear a muffled door latch.
Damn! It slipped away, whatever it was.
A flashing red light spins on *
* winds up and swings * * up into * crushing * completely through * * and rupturing *
SHIT! You lost your grip and fell from *

Morda slashes her cutlass across the albino chobo's chest, carving deep through muscle and ribs in a fantail of blood. The albino chobo's upper body tilts unnaturally backward, exposing the chest cavity and the still-beating heart.
A red light on * begins to flash!
Shit! You're pretty sure he got the bait, too.
Hmm. Nothing seems to be biting.
Flames cover * amid screams of agony.
* wraps tight around * with a zzzzip. * gasps and chokes, then falls on * * clutching at the tensioned *. Morda steps on his chest and pulls, watching the life drain from his face.
* whirls around, sweeping * * in a wide twisting overhead arc just as *
Morda was unable to unearth anything useful.
Hooking in your pickaxe, you pry * free.
The red light on the security camera stops flashing.
Morda's eyes roll back and her face contorts silently.
In a desperate last stand, * shrieks and charges. *
From *, you hear a distant door latch.
A few bits and pieces fly off *
* whizzes past *, missing * by mere inches.
^You think you should head to the (.+) to find .*\.
trigger.send: if autotrack then Send("go %1") else return end -- if
if autotrack then Execute("go %2") SetVariable("quarry", "%1") else return end -- if

trigger.match: * doubles over in pain, and breaks out in a cold sweat. The baby's coming!
* clatter of gunfire tears holes through *
* breaks free and shatters on the ground.

trigger.match: * flail about stupidly in the air.
* emits a sudden POP! and belches white smoke.
* drives * * powerfully upward point-first, passing through *
* gurgles wetly, choking on * gushing from * *
* fires through the air, sailing over *
* drives you out of your hiding place.
* gurgles and belches at *, * swelling obscenely.
* goes limp when * rocks back sharply as shots tear holes through *
* fumbles around with * *, batting idiotically at * in an attempt to kill *
* flails * like a spaz, nearly poking * own eye out!
* falls into the water with a loud splash.
* drives * powerfully into * then rips upward, sending *
* goes limp as * blasts * into the air.
* fires a perfect shot through * down on all fours in anguish*
* falls * in a clatter while * reboot.

trigger.send: ppi.play(path.."combat/duck.ogg",0,0,Gv) if cspam=="on" then print("%0") end

trigger.match: * grunts and squeezes; finally, with a groan and a plop, * squirts out onto *
* wavers in and out of existence, then pop! * gone, leaving the stench of burning hair.*
* tries to skewer * but gets only air.
* throws back * and lets out a stomach-churning howl.
* takes a dive at *, but cuts back at the last second.
* sweeps * * low in a powerful swing at *
* stops chewing and swallows, then lets out a loud belch.
* spurts from one of * gaping wounds.
* tries to take a bite out of *, but comes up short.
* thrusts * but misses by a mile.
* swings around and opens * as * prepares to attack *
* stands up and dusts off * hands.
* watching menacingly as they lodge themselves into * * and flying out *
* tries to butcher * but makes only a mutilated mess.
* then is silenced by a deafening BANG.
* steps in suddenly right next to *, * jammed into *
* tears deep across * * with a spray of *
* swings * * toward *, but does not even come close.
* struggles briefly as * brings * * to bear on *
* stabs * * into *, then rips sideways. * looks down in shock as * * spill writhing onto the ground.
* roars in triumph and yanks * out of * already dead body.
* punches deeply into * * with a loud slicing noise.
* nearly topples over as * fans the air with * *
* rolls in toward * and comes up in a practiced motion to press *
* quickly scans you, blinding you for a split second*
* punches perfectly through * freezes slackjawed, then brings * * weakly up toward the wound*
* pulls the trigger of *, producing * clack*
* pukes a stream of nasty-smelling bile all over *
* opens * mouth to scream, * shot punches in and through *, sending bits of *
* neatly severs * which flops to the ground still twitching*
* raises * above *, unhinges * and lowers it into *
* pulls the trigger of *, producing a soft click.
* places * *against * and starts pushing it toward *
* opens its mouth and emits a soul piercing shriek.
* rips * wide open with a spinning slash, then spinkicks * in the *
* reaches * and opens *. It rises up with a rusty yowl.
* pulses in a weak stream from *
* nick* as they snap shut, leaving a small red incision.
* rips open * with a gout of *
* rears back and winds up for a power * attack.
* pokes feebly at the air with *
* passes in a sideways flash through *
You hear a very loud explosion from the east.
You feel a strong pull back on the line. You've got something!
You scoop * into your mouth, using *
You head down the twisting concrete stairs to the train station.
You haul yourself up over the edge and dust yourself off. You made it!
You feel a tug on your line.
You kick upward toward the surface.
You head west down the highway.
You grasp the rope, hook it around your knees, and start climbing.
You finish feeding and let out a horrible gurgling belch.
You drop cautiously over the edge, thankful for the climber's rope clutched in *
You rush * in a berserker attack!
You grip the rail and head down the stairs.
You frantically kick your way back toward *
You dust yourself off and catch your breath.
You carefully engage *, with regret for your pacifist *
You scoop up * and gobble it up.
You kick through the water to *
You grab * and pull it close to your face.
You feel the sun's rays penetrating you, bringing you strength.
* snaps * at *, the air around * turning ice cold.
* slashes out with its gears at * with a robotic whirr.
* shots fly out, whizzing past * and causing the wind to disturb * *
* snaps * * furiously at * but doesn't even come close to *
* slowly rip open * with a nauseatingly wet sluicing sound.
* shot blasts a gaping hole through *
* slowly reels the line on * back in.
* snaps * * at *, making a loud CRACK!
* smacks hard into * brutalizing it with such force that *
* slices down through * sending * * flying away in a horrible gout of*
* slice out in a slow, lethal arc at *

trigger.send: if area~=44 then area=44 ppi.stop(0) music_id = ppi.play(path.."music/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Mv) amb_id = ppi.play(path.."music/am/"..area..".ogg",1,0,Av) end

trigger.match: [ You begin working on the system. ]
You're getting wet wading in this sludge.
You text * to * on your wristpad.
You struggle through the water, unsure of your swimming skills.
You shovel * into your mouth with your hands.
* snaps * * at *, eyes burning with fury.
* slides artfully around *, embracing * from behind and slamming * * upward, impaling * * from chin to scalp.
* shots tear holes through * amid shrieks of pain!
* shot finds its mark dead center in *
* searches the hallway, poking down around the base of the walls.
* sails in a deadly arc toward *
You shiver from the shock of cold water.

muclient.script:
PPI = require("ppi") ppi = PPI.Load("aedf0cb0be5bf045860d54b7") require "wait" path = GetInfo(56).."/worlds/inferno/" amb_id=0 amb_event = 0 music_id = 0 sound_id = 0 roundtime = 0 Gv = 80 Av = 30 Mv = 30 vol = 1 -- the volume to adjust. vols = {{Gv, Mv, Av}, {"general volume", "music volume", "ambience volume"}} area = "" gender = "" name = "" channel = 0 cspam = "off" craft = "on" autotrack = true look_fetish = false
AcceleratorTo("f5", "adjust_vol(-5)", 12) AcceleratorTo("f6", "adjust_vol(5)", 12) AcceleratorTo("f7", "cycle_volume_options()", 12) Accelerator("shift+enter", "power") function OnPluginInstall() load_vols() end -- func function get_vols() -- returns an integer-indexed table with all three volumes at their current rate gen, mus, amb = Gv, Mv, Av return {gen, mus, amb} end -- func function cycle_volume_options() local v = get_vols() if vol + 1 > #vols[1] then vol = 1 else vol = vol + 1 end -- if Note(vols[2][vol].." at "..v[vol]) end -- func function save_vols() -- commits the changes to a MUSHclient variable to be loaded in at world startup SetVariable("gvol", Gv) SetVariable("mvol", Mv) SetVariable("avol", Av) end -- func function load_vols() -- retrieves the saved volume levels and adjusts each level appropriately if GetVariable("gvol") ~= nil then Gv = tonumber(GetVariable("gvol")) else return end if GetVariable("mvol") ~= nil then Mv = tonumber(GetVariable("mvol")) else return end if GetVariable("avol") ~= nil then Av = tonumber(GetVariable("Avol")) else return end end -- func function adjust_vol(amt) if vol == 1 then if Gv + amt > 100 then Gv = 100 Note("Max volume") elseif Gv + amt < 0 then Gv = 0 Note("Muted") else Gv = Gv + amt ppi.play(path.."general/beep.ogg",0,0,Gv) end -- if elseif vol == 2 then if Mv + amt > 100 then Mv = 100 ppi.slideVol(Mv, music_id, 300) Note("Max volume") elseif Mv + amt < 0 then Mv = 0 ppi.slideVol(Mv, music_id, 300) Note("Muted") else Mv = Mv + amt ppi.play(path.."general/beep.ogg",0,0,Mv) ppi.slideVol(Mv, music_id, 300) end -- if elseif vol == 3 then if Av + amt > 100 then Av = 100 ppi.slideVol(Av, amb_id, 300) Note("Max volume") elseif Av + amt < 0 then Av = 0 ppi.slideVol(Av, amb_id, 300) Note("Muted") else Av = Av + amt ppi.play(path.."general/beep.ogg",0,0,Av) ppi.slideVol(Av, amb_id, 300) end -- if else Note("Something went wrong!") end -- if save_vols() end -- func
function toggle_autotrack() -- it does what you think it does autotrack = not autotrack if autotrack then ppi.play(path.."utilities/autotracking_on.ogg", 0, 0, Gv) else ppi.play(path.."utilities/autotracking_off.ogg", 0, 0, Gv) end -- if end -- func function toggle_ridemode() ridemode = not ridemode if ridemode then Note("On") else Note("off") end -- if end -- func
